Thank you for purchasing jQuery Final Tiles Grid Gallery.

Please note: the version 2.x brings a completely new grid layout algorithm. There are many improvements I'm sure you'll appreciate. But you have to consider that your existing galleries could slightly change, so ...


==== IMPORTANT ====
test the plugin before updating a live site.


If this is your first time with jQuery Final Tiles Grid Gallery then just enjoy it!

Cheers
Diego - GreenTreeLabs
